sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { constructor(private router: Router) {} showNavbar(): boolean { return !( this.router.url.includes('login') || this.router.url.includes('select-role') ); } isUser(): boolean { return localStorage.getItem('role') === 'User'; } isInstructor(): boolean { return localStorage.getItem('role') === 'Instructor'; } getUserName(): string { return localStorage.getItem('fullName') || "Profile"; } logout() { localStorage.clear(); this.router.navigate(['/login']); } isLoggedIn(): boolean { return !!localStorage.getItem("token"); // or use your auth service } }
